name: Lunar Postal Service
description:
Made in a month for the 2020 Game Off Game Jam with the theme of "Moonshot."

PLAY IN BROWSER: https://untitledgamestudio.github.io/moonshot/

Source Code: https://github.com/untitledgamestudio/moonshot

The goal of the game is to deliver mail to the moon for the cheapest possible price. Start off by building a spaceship capable of delivering packages to the moon. Then take control of your spaceship to avoid asteroids, manage fuel consumption, and get those packages delivered!

Development libraries used for the project:

  • Haxe - programming language
  • Heaps.io - game engine
  • Deepnight’s GameBase - framework
